resources.string: In the upper right corner displays the number of your points for which you can buy anything in the store
To go to the store, click on the basket icon
Click anywhere on the screen to start playing
Click on the screen to change the direction of movement of the player
Dodge gray triangles and collect green ones
The number of your points is displayed below
You can see how your chosen color will look right in the store
Products in the store are displayed in the format \"color | price\" or \"rotation angle | price\". If you have not bought the product, it will be highlighted in red
Products in the store are divided into \'colors\' and \'modes\'. To go to a specific group, click on the desired tab
The number of goods purchased in the store
To go to the list of missions, click on the icon on the right
By clicking on the icon on the left you will go to your statistics
Each element of the mission list consists of the task text on the left and the progress on the task on the right
Performing 3 tasks, you get an extra life that you can spend on the game. The indicator at the top shows how many missions are left to complete the rewards
After the first death, you can continue the game by spending an extra life. Their number is displayed in the center of the pop-up window after death. It takes 5 seconds to make a decision
When selecting a green triangle, you become invulnerable for 3 seconds. The timer that appears in the upper left corner shows how long this mode will be active
